title: Debug and Deploy SMS APP - Python - Upwork
description: Job Description: We are seeking a talented and motivated Scheduling App Developer to join our team and assist in implementing a scheduling app for pickup games. Integrate the app with Google Sheets API to store player information and game schedules. Implement Twilio API to enable SMS updates on game status to registered users. Debug and troubleshoot issues within the app to ensure smooth functionality. Work closely with the team to gather requirements and provide technical solutions. Develop and maintain documentation for the app's architecture, APIs, and functionalities. Assist in the transition of the app into a mobile application that complements the SMS text-based version. Requirements: Strong proficiency in Python programming language. Experience with web development frameworks such as Flask or Django. Familiarity with Google Sheets API and Twilio API for integration purposes. Ability to debug and troubleshoot issues in a timely manner. Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively in a team environment. Experience in mobile app development (iOS/Android) is a plus.Skills: AI Agent Development, Web Application, AI App Development, Python

title: Customize and Publish an existing iOS app for Thingsboard Cloud - Upwork
description: I have used MD format to format the requirements.  you can also take a look at it from this link: https://the-nm.notion.site/Thingsboard-iOS-App-Technical-Requirements-Doc-fc801905450f47f09fa816aa60e4c236?pvs=4 # üì∞Background Currently we are using Thingsboard as the IOT Dashboard.  It’s functional and working in production, but there is no iOS app for it.  We need to be able to look at things from the mobile dashboard and right now he can’t do it.  Thingsboard does support an iOS app, but it need to be customized and published on the app store for employess to download and use. we are using Thingsboard Cloud PE version 3.6.2PE+ Our thingsboard API endpoint is  https://thingsboard.cloud # üñåÔ∏èDesign The iOS app is already built, (Github repo below) it just need to be slightly modified and updated.  The iconset that needs to be used is here: --- ### Download the iOS App from Github [ThingsBoard PE Mobile Application Documentation](https://thingsboard.io/docs/pe/mobile/) --- ### Customize App Icons then to customize the app with the icons, use this document and iconset. [astromarine-icons.zip](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/899fb3f1-b038-4d61-aa24-3fe4ae1dd69a/47c9ebd6-d61f-4cd8-8e37-0fa07fcd1d50/astromarine-icons.zip) [Customize ThingsBoard PE Mobile Application](https://thingsboard.io/docs/pe/mobile/customization/) ### White label the App White label the App with the images and colors from the iconset located above. [Configure white-labeling in ThingsBoard PE Mobile Application](https://thingsboard.io/docs/pe/mobile/white-labeling/) # üéßRequirements Explicit functional and non-functional requirements required pre-approval. - [ ]  This is an internal-only app, so should be available to just our internal employees.  Not sure which way is better, Ad  Hoc Distribution or Testflight.  Our employees, managers and executives should be able to download the app, not for outside use. - [ ]  Before publishing, need approval. # üéßDeliverables - [ ]  Deliver the finished app archive - [ ]  Publish to testflight internal only (or ad hoc) - [ ]  Instructions for our internal app manager on how to deploy to our employees # Test Cases | Given | When | Then | Priority | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | the download link for the app | logging in | show the main thingsboard Dashboard | HIGH | | the app | starting up | splash page has the astromarine logo |  | |  |  |  |  | **How will you validate the solution is working correctly?** We will download the app, test to make sure that the icons are installed properly and the splash screen is correct and that it is not publicly available.Skills: iOS, Smartphone, Mobile App Development, iOS Development

title: "Senior Full Stack Web and Mobile App Developer." - Upwork
description: Senior Full Stack Web and mobile app Developer We are looking for Senior MERN Stack and React Native developer having at least 5 Years of working experience. About Us We are Buy and Sales force Service base company looking forward to launching our own Product . What we are looking for At least 5 years of experience with Express/Node.JS At least 5 years of experience using Mongo or similar data storage At least 5 years of building single page applications based on RESTful APIs At least 5 years of React Native experience. Have published at least 3 or 4 app to play store and app store. Knowledge of React Native Animations. Feels comfortable in having standup meeting with Team-mates. Ability to look at the big picture: we're a collaborative small team and expect you to look at the big picture, and proactively anticipate problems, interact with other departments and teammembers, and come up with solutions Strong understanding of database design and management Experience with databases such as MySQL, MongoDB, DynamoDB, etc.Knowledge of unittesting (TDD/BDD tool i.e. Jasmine, Mocha, Protractor) Familiarity with Git and Git workflow Experience with cloud-based technologies such as AWS or Azure Aggressive problem diagnosis and creative problem-solving skills Strong communication and collaboration skills Ability to work independently and in a team environment Ability to work and thrive in a fast-paced environment, learn rapidly and master diverse web technologies and techniques Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise A bachelor's masters degree or higher in Computer Science or a related technical field. Advanced experience with MERN (MongoDB, Express, REACT,REACT-NATIVE, Node) (5 years) Ability to Build and Test RESTful APIs (at least 5 years) Responsibilities: • Develop, test, deploy and maintain web applications using the MERN stack • Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code • Participate in code reviews and ensure that code meets the company's coding standards • Collaborate with product owners, designers, and other developers to build high-quality software • Define code architecture decisions to support high-performance products • Translate wireframes and PSD Designs into functional web applications • Conduct and participate in project planning & scheduling and design discussions • Test to ensure efficiency and optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability • Mentor and provide guidance to junior developers • Integrate data from various back-end services and databases • Stay plugged into emerging technologies/industry trends and apply them into operations and activities • Maintain responsibility for completion and accuracy of work products Skills MongoDB, ReactJS, ExpressJS, NodeJs ,NoSQL, SQL Full Time Gender: Male/Female Minimum Education: Masters / Bachelors Career Level: Experienced Professional Minimum Experience: 5 YearsSkills: JavaScript, Web Development, API Integration, React Native, React, PHP

title: Shopify Developer Needed for Customizing ‚ÄòFocal‚Äô Theme Based on Existing Figma Design - Upwork
description: We are in search of an experienced Shopify developer to customize our already purchased ‘Focal’ theme to align perfectly with our existing Figma design. The project entails a comprehensive suite of tasks ranging from visual customization and responsive design adjustments to advanced feature integration and optimization to ensure an engaging and seamless shopping experience for our global audience. This role requires deep technical proficiency in Shopify and Figma, alongside a strong understanding of e-commerce principles to implement functional, optimized, and visually compelling features. Responsibilities: 1. Theme Customization and Design: • Tailor the ‘Focal’ Shopify theme to match our brand-specific design elements provided in Figma. • Ensure the user interface is responsive and delivers a smooth experience across all devices (mobile, tablet, desktop). 2. Domain and Hosting Setup: • Support the configuration of a top-level international domain, ensuring its proper function and connection to our Shopify store. • Advise on the optimal Shopify plan and assist with hosting setup to meet our business needs. 3. Feature Development and Integration: • Incorporate essential functionalities including user management, product management, SSL security, CDN acceleration, and caching strategies. • Set up a global CDN to guarantee swift page loads regardless of visitor location. 4. Marketing and SEO: • Implement email marketing integrations and develop a content-rich news/blog section. • Optimize the site for search engines, ensuring full Google indexation. 5. User Experience Enhancements: • Introduce a multi-language feature to cater to a diverse global audience. • Incorporate multiple currency options, enhancing the shopping experience for international customers. 6. Social Media and Analytics: • Embed social media sharing options for platforms such as Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram. • Deploy Google Analytics and Facebook Pixel to gather detailed marketing insights and traffic data. 7. Customer Engagement Features: • Develop an integrated online customer service system utilizing platforms like WhatsApp, Line, Telegram, etc. • Introduce product reviews, ratings, and an instant buy-now option to boost engagement and conversions. 8. Security and Compliance: • Enforce stringent security measures to safeguard user information and prevent data breaches. • Implement comprehensive policies for refunds, privacy, shipping, and terms of service to ensure legal compliance. 9. Payment and Logistics Integration: • Assist with setting up a variety of payment gateways (stripe, credit cards, digital currencies, etc.). • Provide advice on effective logistics and shipping strategies. 10. Maintenance and Support: • Offer a full year of maintenance and continuous consultancy services post-launch. • Deliver comprehensive documentation and training for the site management team. Milestones & Deliverables: Milestone 1: Theme Customization and Initial Setup • Deliverable: Customization of the ‘Focal’ theme to match the Figma design, with initial setup of domain and hosting. Milestone 2: Advanced Features and SEO Optimization • Deliverable: Integration of advanced features as outlined, along with complete SEO optimization and marketing setup. Milestone 3: Final Testing, Launch, and Team Training • Deliverable: Completion of final testing, successful store launch, and provision of training materials/sessions for the team. Milestone 4: Post-Launch Support and Optimization • Deliverable: Ongoing support, maintenance, and any needed optimizations, ensuring a smooth operational phase. Application Instructions: Interested candidates are requested to submit a proposal containing: • A brief introduction about their Shopify and Figma experience. • Examples from their portfolio that demonstrate experience with theme customization, especially with the Shopify ‘Focal’ theme. • An outline of their approach to project execution, including strategies for ensuring device responsiveness and international user engagement. • Estimated timelines and budget for achieving the outlined milestones. We’re looking for a developer who can not just fulfill the technical requirements but also passionately contribute to our vision of creating an unparalleled online shopping experience. Your expertise will be instrumental in transforming our Figma designs into a live, fully functional Shopify store that stands out in the competitive e-commerce space.Skills: Landing Page, Ecommerce Website, Page Speed Optimization, Responsive Design, Shopify Development, Shopify, CSS, HTML, PHP, Web Design

title: AI-Hosted Webcam Trivia Game - Upwork
description: 1 - Project Overview: Create a trivia game website with webcam streaming. The game will have an AI host that interacts with players. 2 - Trivia Game Mechanics: Implement user registration, login, player avatar creation, question rounds. Track scores and display leaderboards and jackpot. 3 - Webcam Streaming: Integrate WebRTC or RTMP for webcam streaming. Capture and display player webcams during gameplay with content momitoring. 4 - AI Host: combination of Pre-recorded AI Host: Scripted responses. Live AI Host (GPT-4): Real-time dynamic interactions. Context-Aware AI: Adapt based on game context. 5 - Frontend and Backend: Develop responsive UI using HTML/CSS/JavaScript. Set up APIs for game flow and AI interactions. Store data in a database. 6 - Security and Privacy: Secure webcam streams and handle user data safely. 7 - Testing and Deployment: Test components thoroughly. Deploy on a cloud platform. 8 - Monetization: ads, premium features, or in-app purchases. The following skills will be needed: Web Development Skills: Frontend Development: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript: Create the user interface (UI) for the website. Responsive Design: Ensure the site works well on various devices (desktop, tablet, mobile). Webcam Integration: Implement webcam access and video display. Backend Development: Server-Side Languages: Choose a language like Python (Flask/Django), Node.js, or Ruby on Rails. API Design: Create RESTful APIs for game flow, user authentication, and AI interactions. Database Management: Set up and manage databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB). Streaming media Streaming and Video Skills: WebRTC or RTMP: Understand how to integrate streaming services for webcam video. Video Encoding and Decoding: Handle video data efficiently. Media Servers: Familiarity with setting up and configuring media servers for streaming. Natural language processing AI and NLP Skills: Natural Language Processing (NLP): If using a live AI host, knowledge of NLP models (e.g., GPT-4). Understanding context, generating dynamic responses, and adapting based on interactions. Scripting: For pre-recorded AI hosts, write scripted responses. Security and Privacy Skills: Web Security: Protect user data, especially webcam streams. Authentication and Authorization: Secure user sessions and validate tokens. Data Sanitization: Prevent SQL injection and other vulnerabilities. Project management Project Management and Communication Skills: Planning and Organization: Break down tasks, set milestones, and manage timelines. Effective Communication: Coordinate with team members, freelancers, and stakeholders. Agile Methodologies: Understand agile practices for iterative development. Creativity Creativity and Game Design Skills: Game Mechanics: Design engaging trivia rounds, scoring, and leaderboards. Content Creation: Craft interesting trivia questions and educational tidbits. User Experience (UX): Ensure a smooth and enjoyable player experience. Optional Skills: Monetization Strategies: Understand how to incorporate ads, subscriptions, or in-app purchases. Marketing and Promotion: Promote your trivia game through social media, influencers, and targeted ads.Skills: Python, Game Design, Game Development, Artificial Intelligence, JavaScript, Online Multiplayer, API, WebRTC, Wowza Media Server, GPT-4

title: ReactNative Developer w/ Expertise in iOS, Android Builds/Release manager. Good Git skills required. - Upwork
description: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced ReactNative frontend developer who possesses expertise in creating and maintaining iOS and Android builds. As part of our development team, you will be responsible for building and maintaining responsive web applications using React.js and ensuring their successful deployment on both iOS and Android platforms. Your experience with the Apple Developer portal, Android development, and mobile integration tools such as AppsFlyer, OneSignal, and Firebase will be crucial in achieving smooth and efficient deployment, distribution, and ongoing maintenance of the applications. Responsibilities: - Collaborate with the development team to create highly interactive and responsive web applications using React.js. - Develop and maintain iOS and Android builds of the web applications. - Integrate web applications into mobile platforms, ensuring optimal performance and user experience. - Utilize the Apple Developer portal and Android development tools to manage mobile app deployments. - Implement mobile tracking and analytics using tools such as AppsFlyer and Firebase. - Integrate push notification services, such as OneSignal, into the mobile applications. - Optimize applications for maximum speed and responsiveness on mobile devices. - Conduct thorough testing and debugging on iOS and Android platforms to identify and fix issues. - Collaborate with the design team to ensure consistent branding and visual style across mobile platforms. - Deploy and distribute the mobile applications to the relevant app stores (e.g., Apple App Store, Google Play Store). - Configure app store listings, including app descriptions, screenshots, and promotional materials. - Monitor the app's performance, user feedback, and crash reports for maintenance and updates. Required Skills and Qualifications: - Strong proficiency in React.js and its core principles. - Solid understanding of JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, and responsive design. - Experience in creating and maintaining iOS and Android builds. - Familiarity with the Apple Developer portal and its submission processes. - Proficiency in Android development and knowledge of relevant tools and frameworks. - Experience with mobile analytics and tracking tools such as AppsFlyer and Firebase. - Knowledge of integrating push notification services like OneSignal. - Proficient in version control systems, specifically Git, for managing codebase efficiently. Familiarity with RESTful APIs and asynchronous request handling. - Ability to work with UI/UX designers to bridge the gap between graphical design and mobile implementation. - Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. - Excellent communication and collaboration skills. - Experience with deploying mobile applications to app stores and managing app store listings. Preferred Qualifications: - Experience with React Native for mobile app development. - Familiarity with mobile app testing and debugging tools. - Understanding of mobile app optimization techniques. - Knowledge of mobile app security best practices. If you have a true talent for creating stunning, polished UI screens and possess the skills to back it up, we would love to hear from you. Please provide your portfolio and any relevant work samples along with your application. Please note that this is a remote position. Kindly include your availability, expected hourly rate, and preferred communication channels in your application. Skills: React, Git, React Native, Android

title: Application development  - Upwork
description: Developing an application for schools to track student fees would involve several key steps: 1. features such as viewing fee statements, making payments, receiving notifications, etc., 2. **Design**: Create a user-friendly interface for both administrators and parents. Admins need access to comprehensive fee management tools, while parents need a simple interface to view and pay fees. 3. **Backend Development**: Build a robust backend system to store student data, fee information, payment history, etc.  involve databases, APIs for payment gateways, and security measures to protect sensitive information. 4. **Admin Panel Development**: Develop an admin panel with features like adding/editing student records, generating fee invoices, tracking payments, sending reminders, and generating reports. 5. **Parent App Development**: Create a mobile application for parents to access their child's fee information, make payments securely, view payment history, and receive notifications about upcoming due dates or outstanding balances. 6. **Integration of Payment Gateway**: Integrate a secure payment gateway to facilitate online payments within the app. This involves ensuring compliance with relevant regulations and implementing encryption for secure transactions. 7. **Testing**: Thoroughly test the application for bugs, usability issues, and security vulnerabilities. This includes both automated testing and manual testing by real users. 8. **Deployment**: Deploy the application to production servers and app stores, ensuring scalability and reliability to handle the expected user load.Skills: JavaScript, Smartphone, iOS, Android, Mobile App Development, Tablet, API, Desktop Application, PHP, Java

title: Develop User-Friendly AI Bot for Software Documentation - Upwork
description:
We seek a skilled and experienced freelancer to develop a user-friendly AI bot (DBSSBot) trained on our software documentation (user manual) and hosted on our own servers. The bot will answer user queries and provide informative responses, including embedded pictures and videos.
Responsibilities:
Choose and set up Amazon Bedrock.
Set up Amazon Lex:
Create a new Lex bot and configure its channels (e.g., web chat, messaging app).
Design the conversation flow, intents, and slots to understand user queries.
Train the bot:
Extract key information and entities from our user manual.
Craft training phrases and corresponding responses that accurately address user questions.
Test and refine the bot's performance through iterative training cycles.
Integrate multimedia:
Store images and videos in a suitable location (e.g., AWS S3).
Implement techniques to display images and videos within the bot's responses (e.g., linking or embedding).
Deploy the bot:
Integrate the trained bot with our existing infrastructure on our servers.
Conduct thorough testing to ensure seamless operation and user experience.
Qualifications:
Strong experience with Amazon Lex and its capabilities.
Solid understanding of Natural Language Processing (NLP) concepts and techniques.
Proficiency in designing conversational flows and crafting chatbot dialogues.
Experience integrating multimedia content into chatbots.
Familiarity with cloud-based deployment and server integration.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Additional Information:
Please provide links to your relevant portfolio or past projects.
Describe your experience with similar NLP projects, particularly those involving chatbot development and multimedia integration.
Outline your approach to ensuring data security and user privacy throughout development.

title: Website/Web App Developer - Upwork
description: We are looking for a skilled website/web app developer to assist in building a platform for scheduling bike rides with other people. The ideal candidate should have experience in developing responsive and user-friendly websites or web apps. Some key requirements for this project include: 1. Set Up the Environment: * Use a web framework (e.g., React for the frontend). * Choose a backend technology (e.g., Node.js with Express). * Select a database (e.g., MongoDB). 2. Frontend Development: * Design the UI/UX. * Implement React components for registration, login, event creation, event listing, and profile management. 3. Backend Development: * Implement user authentication (e.g., JWT for secure login). * Create API endpoints for user registration, login, event creation, event listing, and profile updates. * Integrate with the database to store and retrieve data. 4. Database Design: * Users collection (with fields for username, password, email, etc.). * Events collection (with fields for event details, location, date, creator, etc.). * Sign-ups collection (linking users with events they've signed up for). 5. Search Functionality: * Implement search logic to filter events by geographic region. 6. Testing and Validation: * Ensure all functionalities work as expected. * Validate inputs on both client and server sides. 7. Deployment: * Choose a hosting platform. * Deploy the frontend and backend.Skills: Node.js, MongoDB, React, Web Development, JavaScript, Web Design, PHP, HTML, Web Application, Adaptive Web Design

title: PWA Development and Deployment Expert using Vite React - Upwork
description: PLEASE SHOW YOUR PREVIOUS PROJECT ON HIRING LETTER! :) We are seeking a skilled developer who can create a Progressive Web App (PWA) using Vite React JS and deploy it to the Google Store. The project involves converting existing code written in vanilla JS into a PWA. This is the code in Vanilla JS: https://github.com/catchspider2002/periodic-table.io and this is the application: https://ru.periodic-table.io/ The ideal candidate should have a solid understanding of Vite React and experience with PWA development and deployment. Attention to detail and the ability to follow instructions are crucial for this job. The successful candidate will work closely with our team to deliver a high-quality PWA that meets our requirements: TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS The software "Periodic Table" is designed as a mobile application that runs on all devices supporting the Google Play platform. The "Periodic Table" software should support and adaptively work on screens with HD, Full HD, and 4K resolutions. The operation of the "Periodic Table" software (navigation through the table, element selection, accessing the settings tab, etc.) can be done by touching the display of a touchscreen device. Alternative control of the software can be achieved by pressing corresponding buttons on a wireless remote control. The software control allows highlighting selected chemical elements, activating voice guidance with informational audio materials, adjusting the volume of audio playback, and managing other parameters according to the specifications. On the main screen of the "Periodic Table" software, the Supplier should display the logo of the Customer. The interface of the "Periodic Table" software by default includes the Russian and English languages, and it has the capability to expand the language base. In the developed "Periodic Table" software, it is necessary to implement the entire interface and all functions reflected on the website: https://ru.periodic-table.io/. Skills: React Native, JavaScript, React, Android

title: Experienced AR (LiDAR) Developer Needed for House Scanning App on iOS Mobile & iPad - Upwork
description: We're looking for a seasoned developer for our Augmented Reality (AR) application for iOS platforms, specifically targeting iPhones and iPads. We are implementing limited features similar to Poly.cam house scan. Our project aims at elevating the standards of scanning utilities for residential and commercial spaces. This application promises to be a breakthrough in capturing the dimensions of buildings and rooms and creating floor plans. The app will interact with our servers up and down to recommend certain equipment, and AR-project equipment in real-time. The end result is creating a full documentation and some proposals to share with the client. What we have now & Enhancements Needed: - Room Scanning: Our current App can now scan rooms and floor spaces, covering each room. While we've reached this milestone, there's an opportunity to refine and enhance the overall user experience. - Dimension Calculations: Automatic calculation of room dimensions including length, width, and height is functional. - Volume & Object Recognition: The app automatically calculates room volume and recognizes windows, doors (with measurements and counts), and wall objects like cabinets and pictures. We're looking to recognize other objects automatically. New Features to Develop: - Design and implement an engaging icon and splash screen, accompanied by secure login functionality. - Generate a detailed map and plan of the house, incorporating manual annotations or automatic recognition of wall orientations. - Facilitate real-time data exchange with a server, including sending and receiving scans, data, and images. - Enable users to superimpose 3D objects in the scanned space accurately and project equipment into the room at scale. Enable capture on-demand - Ensure source code delivery post each development milestone, with continuous updates made available through Testflight. - Conduct thorough testing, refine based on feedback, and prepare the app for a seamless deployment on the App Store. Development Milestones: This project will be segmented into 3 pivotal milestones, with payments disbursed upon the successful completion of each phase. The final milestone will encompass 40% of the total budget, reflecting its significance in finalizing the application for market release. Design and User Access: Completion of app design elements including the icon, splash screen, and secure login. Advanced Scanning Features: Enhancement of existing scanning features and development of new functionalities for comprehensive house mapping. Server Interaction and 3D Implementation: Development and integration of server communication protocols, alongside the introduction of 3D object superimposition. Finalization and Testing: Extensive testing, revisions as necessary, and preparation for deployment on both Android and iOS platforms. Budget & Payment: The total budget for this project will be specified, reflecting the comprehensive nature of the development work. title: Senior React Native - to Deploy Application - Upwork
description: We are on the hunt for a skilled React Native Developer to join our innovative tech team. Our project revolves around developing a cutting-edge mobile application designed to enhance user engagement and streamline operational processes. As we gear up to scale our solution, we require a developer who is not only proficient in React Native development but also experienced in deploying apps through CI/CD pipelines on AWS and managing app updates efficiently. Responsibilities: Develop and maintain high-quality React Native applications. Ensure seamless integration with back-end services. Collaborate closely with the design team to understand end-user requirements and translate them into technical specifications. Implement automated testing platforms and unit tests as part of the development process. Lead the deployment process of new app versions to both iOS and Android platforms without downtime or user disruption. Utilize AWS services for deploying and managing the application, ensuring high availability and scalability. Work with CI/CD tools to automate testing and deployment processes. Develop strategies for app testing without pushing directly to app stores, using tools like TestFlight for iOS and internal testing tracks in Google Play. Manage app versioning and updates efficiently, ensuring compatibility and smooth transition across app updates. Maintain code integrity and organization, including ensuring code compliance with industry standards and best practices. Qualifications: 3+ years of experience in React Native development. Strong understanding of the React Native framework and its core principles. Experience with deployments, CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, CircleCI), and AWS services. Proven track record of deploying apps and managing updates in a live environment. Familiarity with code versioning tools, such as Git. Knowledge of modern authorization mechanisms, such as JSON Web Token. Experience with automated testing suites, like Jest or Mocha. Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work under pressure. Strong communication and teamwork skills. Application/Bid Requirements: Resume/CV: Highlighting relevant React Native development experience. Portfolio/GitHub Repo: Showcasing your contributions to mobile app projects, especially those involving React Native. LinkedIn Profile: To understand your professional background. Cover Letter: Explaining why you're the perfect fit for this role, including details of your experience with CI/CD pipelines on AWS and app deployment strategies. References: Preferably from previous projects or employers in the tech industry. Join us to embark on this exciting journey to revolutionize our digital offerings. If you're passionate about building scalable, high-performance applications and have a knack for solving complex problems, we'd love to hear from you.Skills: React Native, React, JavaScript, iOS, Android, Mobile App Development, Smartphone, Node.js

title: (ARKit) Extend functionalities of existing, profitable iOS ARKit app - Upwork
description: Looking for an expert ARKit iOS developer to lead the expansion of an existing, cash-positive iOS ARKit app. This is a unique opportunity to work on an extremely fun 3D project and add new AI, 3D and XR-based capabilities to an existing app with a large, and established user base. You will also get the chance to learn new technologies such as CoreML, Gen AI, and the Vision Pro. You will work closely with me, the original developer, and throughout the time we work together, we will define the roadmap of next features to implement. Then you'll get the chance of leading the implementation! Your work will include: * Prioritizing features against each other based on our interest and users' requests & feedback * Coming up with technical solutions and implementing the features * Integrating on-device AI * Defining the UX for the new features * Bugfixes and code maintenance * Releasing new versions of the app, and beta testing with Testflight * Work on the Vision Pro version of the App Skills you should have: * Solid, working knowledge of ARKit, iOS, Swift * Experience with StoreKit 2 * Understanding of SceneKit / RealityKit * Ability to reason about 3D linear algebra * A passion for thinking at the product level, and an eye for design If you're interested, tell us how you'd go about showing an animated GIF in a SceneKit app, and include the word "CAAnimation" in your reply :)Skills: ARKit, iOS, Swift, In-App Purchases, Apple Xcode
